body: I voted for a second time, and re logged into the server multiple times, but didn't recieve the package. Is there some limit about the number of times you can vote for xp?
body_tagged: I voted for a second time, and re logged into the server multiple times, but didn't recieve the package. Is there some limit about the number of times you can vote for xp?
title: I voted  but didn't recieve a 30xp package
